definition: (located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)

sentences.english: We also urge opposition parties to present their manifestoes to voters as early as possible.
sentences.chinese: 我們還敦促在野黨儘早發佈他們對選民的政治宣言。

sentences.english: The opposition Democratic Progressive Party, which Chen once led, has urged the government to free him immediately.
sentences.chinese: 在野黨民進黨，陳曾經領導過，敦促政府立即釋放他。

sentences.english: For the minority, the gravest threat to the stability of the Republic.
sentences.chinese: 對於在野黨來說，它是對國家穩定的最嚴重威脅。

sentences.english: How was it able to form and survive successfully without real challenges from the opposition parties?
sentences.chinese: 在野黨爲什麼沒有能夠成功地提出不信任案？

sentences.english: In particular, he wants collaboration with opposition parties mostly bent on ousting him.
sentences.chinese: 特別地，他希望能和決意令他下臺的在野黨合作。
